products.name: Sophie - Angelic Sound Engineer
products.description: Rewrote the future of sound. A tribute to fluid identity, synthetic emotion and the power of sound as self-expression.

products.name: Marsha P. Johnson - Resistance Warrior
products.description: Marsha P. Johnson represents the fight for liberation and visibility, now reimagined as a collectible action figure.

products.name: Grace Jones - Warrior Woman From Beyond
products.description: Fearless. Untouchable. Iconic. A fusion of power, performance and presence.

products.name: Vivienne Westwood - Punk Designer
products.description: An icon of rebellion and anti-fashion turned into a powerful collectible. Fashion as protest.

products.name: Sylvia Rivera - Activist Hero
products.description: A fighter for justice and community. This figure honors Sylvia Rivera's legacy as a fearless voice for trans liberation.
